sections.title: Genie Binder (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Genie Binder class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Genie Binder)
sections.description: Genie binders gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Binding Pool (Su) (Genie Binder)
sections.description: A supernatural resource pool equal to twice class level that recharges daily, used to enhance Charisma checks against genies and power other class features.

sections.title: Elemental Seal (Sp) (Genie Binder)
sections.description: A spell-like ability to create magical runes that charm genies, grant elemental benefits to allies, or function as explosive glyphs when placed on surfaces.

sections.title: Genie Mastery (Su) (Genie Binder)
sections.description: At 1st level, choose between gaining a genie eidolon companion or advancing spellcasting progression from a previous class.

sections.title: Genie Summoner (Su) (Genie Binder)
sections.description: Adds specific genies to summon monster spell lists, requiring binding pool expenditure and preventing summoned genies from casting wish.

sections.title: Extra Seal (Su) (Genie Binder)
sections.description: Increases the number of elemental seals that can be maintained simultaneously from one to two at 3rd level, and three at 5th level.

sections.title: Unstoppable Seal (Su) (Genie Binder)
sections.description: At 5th level, spend a binding pool point when placing an elemental seal on a genie to increase the save DC by 2.
